body_html: I had the same issue, but it inexplicably went away after rebooting my computer (very sad, that's the type of behaviour I expect from a Windows system, not linux). Using CUDA 9.1, cuDNN 7.2.1, Bazel 0.17.2 here, with Ubuntu 18.04.
